name: Kimchi Jjigae
description: A spicy and hearty Korean stew made with kimchi, pork or tofu, onions, and tofu, often served bubbling hot.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
description: A flavorful Korean dish where cold cooked rice is stir-fried with kimchi, vegetables, and often topped with a fried egg

name: Bibimbap
description: A signature Korean dish consisting of a bowl of warm white rice topped with seasoned vegetables, chili pepper paste, a raw or fried egg, and sliced meat, all mixed together before eating
